content:
We should decide how we would like to see the Manage Routes pages ordered.

Instead of the why they are ordered now, they could be

  • Routes Tab
  • Routes Properties
  • Use Routes
  • Tracks Tab
  • Tracks Properties
  • Use Tracks
  • Waypoints-Marks Tab
  • Waypoint Properties
  • Use Waypoints-Marks
  • Use Layers
  • and so on.

Any thoughts about that?

Rick Gleason said:

We should decide how we would like to see the Manage Routes pages ordered.

Instead of the why they are ordered now, they could be

  • Routes Tab
  • Routes Properties
  • Use Routes
  • Tracks Tab
  • Tracks Properties
  • Use Tracks
  • Waypoints-Marks Tab
  • Waypoint Properties
  • Use Waypoints-Marks
  • Use Layers
  • and so on.

Any thoughts about that?

Makes total sense to me, would be a lot more logical.
Thanks Fabio, I'll change it this morning.

It would be very helpful to have Editors focus on certain pages to get this DONE.
Editors are needed!
Under Manage Routes we have:

  1. Routes Tab, Routes Properties, Use Routes
  2. Track Tab, Track Properties, Use Tracks - @Mike Guryan
  3. Waypoints-Marks Tab, Waypoint Properties, Use Waypoints-Marks
  4. Layers Tab, Layers Properties, Use Layers - Kevin Cyklop

We need two other editors to volunteer to do Routes or Waypoints pages.
